sources.title: The Devil's Brigade (1968) William Holden · Cliff Robertson
sources.description: During World War II, a US colonel trains a newly formed elite unit for special operations in Italy and Norway, consisting partly of convicts. Thanks to rigorous training, the motley commando unit proves itself to be an excellent force.   A militaristic, perseverance film with a routine adventure plot, modeled after the film " The Dirty Dozen ."

metadata.Plot: During World War II, a special fighting unit is formed that combines a crack Canadian Army unit and a conglomeration of U.S. Army misfits who had previously served time in military jails. After an initial period of conflict between the two groups, their enmity turns to respect and friendship, and the unit is sent Italy to attempt a dangerous mission that has heretofore been considered impossible to carry out.
metadata.Writer: William Roberts, Robert H. Adleman, George Walton
metadata.Actors: William Holden, Cliff Robertson, Vince Edwards
